detaileddescription.para: If emailLogFileTo and logFilePathName is set then email the logFilePathName content if not empty

para.para: Set a new level for debugging or return the existing one. If level is LevelFromEnv then use the config.environment_levels setting for the current environment ('dev', 'test' or 'live')

parameterdescription.para: to set and any other options such as to screen etc

simplesect.para: $this if any params passed, current level if not

detaileddescription.para:
Set level from config.environment_levels for passed type
string $env
'dev', 'test', 'live'
$this

parameterdescription.para: a level to compare to current set level and any other output options such as Screen etc

detaileddescription.para: Set the email address to send emails to

Log to provided file or to a generated file. Filename is relative to site root if it starts with a '/' otherwise is interpreted as relative to assets folder. Checks to make sure final log file path is inside the web root.

parameterdescription.para: log to this file or if not supplied generate one

detaileddescription.para: At end of Debugger lifecycle file set by toFile will be sent to this email address.
Set levels and source and if flags indicate debugging to file screen or email initialise those aspects of debugging using defaults from config.
Return level if level from facilities less than current level otherwise false.

Returns a log file path and name relative to the assets folder using config.log_path. If path doesn't exist and is in the assets folder then will try and create it (recursively). If it is outside the assets folder then will not try and create the path.
